layout.name: length
layout.title: Length
layout.tooltip: How many blocks wide the platform is.

layout.name: pivot
layout.title: Pivot Point
layout.tooltip: The pivot point that all of the platform's rotation is based off of. It can be between 0 and 1, where 0 is the very left and 1 is the very right.

children.name: speed
children.title: Speed
children.tooltip: How many frames it takes the platform to complete a full cycle.

children.name: amount
children.title: Amount
children.tooltip: How far the platform rotates to the left or right.

children.name: offset
children.title: Offset
children.tooltip: An offset added to the platform's rotation.
